name: MetricSplitMediaAbout
description: Split-layout about section with text, metrics cards, and media in a 2-column grid.

title.example: We help automate what matters most

description.example: Hamilton, a growing e-commerce business, was overwhelmed by repetitive tasks. We built custom automation that integrated with their tools.

structure.title: string - Metric label/title (required, e.g., 'Hours saved every month')

metricRules.note: Provide 1-2 metrics for optimal layout. Grid displays 1 metric as single column, 2 metrics as 2 columns on desktop.

usageExample:
// Wrap in ThemeProvider
import { Sparkles } from 'lucide-react';

<ThemeProvider defaultButtonVariant="text-stagger" defaultTextAnimation="entrance-slide" borderRadius="rounded" cardStyle="solid" primaryButtonStyle="gradient" secondaryButtonStyle="glass">
  <MetricSplitMediaAbout
    tag="Case study"
    tagIcon={Sparkles}
    title="We help automate what matters most"
    description="Hamilton, a growing e-commerce business, was overwhelmed by repetitive order processing. We built custom automation that integrated seamlessly with their existing tools."
    metrics={[{ value: '50+', title: 'Hours saved every month' }, { value: '40%', title: 'Reduction in manual work' }]}
    imageSrc="/placeholders/placeholder.jpg"
    imageAlt="Case study image"
    useInvertedBackground="noInvert"
  />
</ThemeProvider>
